question: From the given options 1 to 4 , please find out the one which is not an objective of a central Bank of a country?
option1: The central Bank of a country aims at profit
option2: The central bank is given powers to control and regulate the working of the commercial banks
option3: The central bank is given powers to control and regulate the working of the commercial banks
option4: Central Bank generally controls the credit
answer: The central Bank of a country aims at profit
